name: Brad
description:
A platform adventure about music, memories, and family.

Brad is a game honoring the life of my father Bradford Allen Hager. 

February 21, 2017 Brad passed away from a severe heart attack in an unexpected instant that shocked our entire family. 

3 years later, I am releasing this game to share with the world a piece of his story.

FEATURES:

  • Unlock new guitar notes to alter the level around you in different ways
  • Collect photos to relive fond memories of the past
  • Visual-based story telling

MUSIC by Carl Hager , Brad's brother and musical jam partner in crime.

SOCIAL MEDIA:

Soli Deo Gloria
